title.rendered: Kurt Nye, Group Head of Alternative Investments, Featured in Barron’s

content.rendered:
Kurt Nye contributed to a recent article in Barron’s that discusses how the SEC has recently been trying to tame the cryptocurrency industry. In the article, advisors explain what the crackdown means for crypto as an investment option. 

“Regulatory clarity and oversight for crypto is ultimately a good thing for fiduciary advisors considering an allocation. The existing ecosystem has had a number of issues, whether it’s high-profile exchange failures, hedge fund failures or scam coins.”

Read the entire article

By clicking on the above link, you will leave MAI’s site and will be directed to a third-party site which MAI does not endorse and is not affiliated.  Some third-party sites require registration or subscription to view content.  Please see MAI’s disclosure page for more information.
